dtwSat
=====

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/vwmaus/dtwSat.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/vwmaus/dtwSat) [![License](http://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL%20%28%3E=%202%29-brightgreen.svg?style=flat)](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html) [![CRAN](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/dtwSat)](http://cran.r-project.org/package=dtwSat) [![month](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/dtwSat)](http://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/dtwSat) [![total](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/dtwSat)](http://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/dtwSat)

### Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping for satellite image time series analysis

The \proglang{R} package *dtwSat* provides an implementation of the Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping (TWDTW) method for land cover mapping using multi-band satellite image time series [@Maus:2016; @Maus:2019]. *dtwSat* provides full cycle of land cover classification using image time series, ranging from selecting temporal patterns to visualizing, and assessing the results.

## Installing

Install either from CRAN

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("dtwSat")
```

or install the development versions from GitHub

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("vwmaus/dtwSat")
```
